nl.helixsoft.gui.preferences

Interface Preference

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AppPreference

    public interface Preference
    A preference must have at least two things:
    1. a key in the hash maintained by PreferenceMgr
    2. a default value
    Anything that implements this interface can be stored as a preference. We recommend defining mulitple Preferences in an enum, but that is not absolutely required.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getDefault()
      The default value for this property.
      java.lang.String name()
      name will be the "key" in the properties file.

    • Method Detail

      • name

        java.lang.String name()
        name will be the "key" in the properties file. If you use an enum that implements this interface, name will be automatically defined

      • getDefault

        java.lang.String getDefault()
        The default value for this property. Used to initialize when the key is not present in the properties file, or if the user wants to reset to default values.
